@petergoes
Q: Do users want this level of customisation?
A: From what I gather, having worked with disabled people for a long time, they're neither more expert than average users, nor more prone to all this cookie dance. So I'd wager not. Doing something for dark mode, thought, may be a good start as it is automatic. We can't provision for all system configurations, although the more we strive for accessibility and standards, the easier people can cope with our websites.
